required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Saline Irrigation in the Peritoneal Cavity at Cesarean Delivery on Maternal Morbidity

lead_sponsor.agency: Istanbul Bakirkoy Maternity and Children Diseases Hospital

clinical_study.source: Istanbul Bakirkoy Maternity and Children Diseases Hospital

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: we hypotheised that irrigating the abdominal cavity with saline at the time of cesarean delivery will decrease maternal infectious morbidity(especially febril morbidity) without increasing operation time and the rate of GİS disfunction

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.description: postoperative febril morbidity and endometritis, parametritis

secondary_outcome.description: postoperative vomiting, nousea and bowel packed

clinical_study.condition: Focus of Study is Postoperative Enfectious Morbidity and Postoperative GİS Functionally Recovery

arm_group.arm_group_label: saline irrigation after uterine wall closed
arm_group.description: irrigation group:saline irrigation(500 ml %0.9 NaCl)after uterine wall closed no-irrigation group:no irrigation after uterine wall closed

intervention.intervention_name: irrigation in the peritoneal cavity with saline.
intervention.arm_group_label: saline irrigation after uterine wall closed

study_pop.textblock: all pregnant women between 18 years or older and who requıred cesarean delivery.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Between 18 years or older
2. Requıred ceserean delivery
Exclusion Criteria:
1. chorioamnıonıtıs
2. type 1 diabetes mellitus
3. placenta previa and acreata
4. prior severe gastrointestional disease

overall_official.affiliation: T.C. Kanuni Sultan Süleyman Teaching Hospital

facility.name: T.C. Kanuni Sultan Süleyman Teaching Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Istanbul Bakirkoy Maternity and Children Diseases Hospital
responsible_party.investigator_title: T.C. Şişli Etfal E A H
